title: A new strategy for immobilization of copper on the Fe3O4@EDTA nanocomposite and its efficient catalytic applications in reduction and one-pot reductive acetylation of nitroarenes and also N-acetylation of arylamines
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Leila Mavaddatiyan, Behzad Zeynizadeh
